name: Hysyphus
description:
Hysyphus - The Great Betrayer.

Having killed his companion in an act of greed, he faces eternal life—  but now as punishment: dying over, and over, and over again to pay for his crimes against the Gods. 

GAME CONTROLS:

 - WASD or Arrow Keys for Movement

 - Escape in-game to pause.

 - Hint: Turning quickly can help you move faster!

FRUITS

Each fruit has different effects! Read below to find out what they do.

  • Apples  - Grows snake length by 3.
  • Limes - Speeds up snake movement for 6 seconds.
  • Watermelon - Slows down snake movement for 6 seconds.
  • Bananas - Extra growth length for 8 seconds.
  • Mango - No growth for 8 seconds.
  • Starfruit - Give invincibility for 10 seconds.

GAMEPLAY:

Survive, collect fruits, grow, and increase your score! When you run out of lives, a scoreboard will pop up with your high score— go ahead, try to beat them!

(Yes, all high scores shown in-game were achieved by our team members or playtesters.  If you can't reach them, consider not being a loser ( :    )
